des:
A fun burn to roast Friends and family. Created by the master Stop motion creator PuttyBot.
This amazing roast Came into potty bots mind while he was surfing the app. Use this app to roast people... especially thick people.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
